``` {r eval=FALSE}

.restaurants <- .restaurants %>% filter(latitude!="NA"&longitude!="NA")

.restdat <- toGeoJSON (.restaurants, dest=tempdir(), lat.lon=c("latitude", "longitude"))

reststyle <- styleGrad(prop="mean_score", breaks=c(0,75,80,85,90,95,100), style.val=heat.colors(6), leg="Average Restaurant Score", fill.alpha=0.5, rad=4 )

rest.map <- leaflet(data=.restdat, dest=tempdir(), center= c(37.77694,-122.4314), zoom=14, style= reststyle, title="San Francisco Restaurant Scores", base.map="mqosm", popup=c("business", "mean_score", "interval"))
                    
```
